title: NAFTA plays waiting game at key talks in Mexico
text:
NAFTA plays waiting game at key talks in Mexico Wednesday, February 28, 2018 - 01:32 
NAFTA delegations from Mexico and Canada are awaiting the return of the U.S. negotiator for regional content requirements in autos, in a development some hoped would lead to progress on the contentious issue during the seventh round of talks in Mexico City. David Pollard reports.
